mapper.insert: insert into point(user_id, amount, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{amount}, NOW())
mapper.update: update point set amount = #{amount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE point_id = #{pointId}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN type IN ('DEPOSIT', 'TRADE_SALE', 'PAYOUT', 'REFUND', 'CANCEL', 'ALLOCATION') AND status = 'COMPLETED' THEN amount WHEN type IN ('INVEST', 'WITHDRAW') AND status = 'COMPLETED' THEN -amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) FROM point_transaction WHERE user_id = #{userId}
